overview: Dr. Thieu’s research centers on using natural language processing (NLP) and multi-modal machine learning to advance the forefront of cancer informatics. His work has been resulting in cutting-edge methods for cancer registry, ICD code identification, functional status identification, disease progression, disease recurrence, early-prediction modeling.
research_interests:
Dr. Thieu’s research centers on using natural language processing (NLP) and multi-modal machine learning to advance the forefront of cancer informatics. His work has been resulting in cutting-edge methods for cancer registry, ICD code identification, functional status identification, disease progression, disease recurrence, early-prediction modeling.
